column4: hey does anyone know of a transparent text editor or IDE.  Not just nano ran in terminal - I want to be able to watch a movie in the background and write code over top of it
GNU Emacs in a terminal/vim in a terminal?
that doesn't work does it?  I believe terminal only shows the desktop background when transparent - I don't believe it shows windows / applications that are open in the backdrop
I don't use transparency myself, so I couldn't tell you.
